duties_responsibilities.duty: Document project requirements under senior staff direction
Ensure compliance with applicable codes and regulations
Produce design deliverables as directed by senior staff
Coordinate architectural design with consulting engineering design
Prepare architectural detailing for project documentation
Participate in technical discussions with project teams and clients
Observe project construction and report on document compliance

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Architecture (Masters/Professional degree preferred)
Registered Architect or on path to licensure preferred
LEED Green Associate and NCARB preferred
USA project experience of 3+ years REQUIRED
US Citizen or current US Employment Authorization Document
